name: Exploring the Solar System
description:
In this game, your spaceship is teleported to a different planet every 5 seconds :) Use the up down right and left arrows to move the camera! (Go Fullscreen for better experience)

Music Credit: Royalty Free Music from Bensound https://www.bensound.com/

Asset Credits : Saturn's rings https://github.com/boardtobits/planet-ring-mesh/blob/master/PlanetRing.cs
